en_text: I'm not returning to Tokyo. Not because I can't get back into Kou-chan's life.
jp_text: 孝ちゃんとのいつもに戻れないから　東京に戻らないんじゃない
google_translated: I can not return to Tokyo because I can not return always with Taku-chan

en_text: It's because my life exists here.
jp_text: 孝ちゃんのことも…
google_translated: Takashi's thing ...

en_text: It's me, not anybody else, who chose to live this life.
jp_text: このいつもを選んだのは　誰でもない　私だから
google_translated: Because this always chosen is me

en_text: I like everyone working at Kissui Inn.
jp_text: 喜翠荘で働くみんなが好き
google_translated: I like everyone who works in Koji

en_text: Kou-chan!
jp_text: 孝ちゃん！
google_translated: Takashi!

en_text: Kou-chan, sorry for everything.
jp_text: いろいろありがとう
google_translated: Thank you for everything

en_text: Thanks for all you've done for me!
jp_text: いろいろ　ありがとう…
google_translated: Thank you for everything…

en_text: ...in anticipation of a world with clear skies...
jp_text: 競演水着だって持ってきたんだから
google_translated: Because it has been a competition swimsuit

en_text: You'll confess to her, won't you?
jp_text: 告白するんでしょ　彼女に
google_translated: I confess to her

en_text: What, Ohana-chan? You want to be a waitress?
jp_text: へえ　緒花ちゃん仲居さんになりたいの？
google_translated: Do you want to be a Hayaba-chan Nakative?

en_text: I don't really understand Yuina-san.
jp_text: 私は結名さんがよく分かりません
google_translated: I do not understand Mr. Yuji
